entry.title: Blue Yeti USB Microphone
entry.summary: Excellent 9/10 I have purchased several of these from Amazon, but only one was a replacement for one that stopped working. Be sure to check various colors to get best price. I needed a good quality microphone to do online video streaming. I had already…
entry.content:
Excellent 9/10

I have purchased several of these from Amazon, but only one was a replacement for one that stopped working. Be sure to check various colors to get best price.

 

Rational

I needed a good quality microphone to do online video streaming. I had already bought one previously for my children to use and was happy enough with the quality to get another one for myself.

Use

This microphone works equally well as a USB device while using Linux or Windows. One feature I like is that I can plug my Sony MDR7506 headphones right into the microphone and use the volume control on the Blue Yeti.

Rating

Excellent 9/10

Buy it on Amazon

entry.title: Sony MDR7506 Professional
entry.summary: Excellent 9/10 I purchased these Sony headphones from Amazon. I work from home and needed some headphones for two reasons. One, to block out various noises from other household members. Two, to keep my own audio to myself. Since I had to wear these for…
entry.content:
Excellent 9/10

I purchased these Sony headphones from Amazon.

 

Rational

I work from home and needed some headphones for two reasons. One, to block out various noises from other household members. Two, to keep my own audio to myself. Since I had to wear these for hours a day, I wanted something light and comfortable.

Concerns

Buying headphones online is always an iffy experience since you do not know how they will fit you. Will they be too tight, too large, too small, cause ear pain, sound good?

Use

These are the best headphones I have ever used. If they broke I would immediately order another pair. The audio quality is excellent, they are light, they are comfortable.

I have even taken them traveling and used them on flights. This next time though I will be using my Soundcore Q30's for travel and won't have to worry about breaking these.

Rating

Excellent 9/10

Buy it on Amazon

entry.title: Echo Studio and Echo Sub
entry.summary: Outstanding 10/10 I bought the Echo Studio and Echo Sub from Amazon. I have used Echo dots for a long time. When I was looking to replace my computer's speakers I throw the Echo Studio into the possibilities. The specifications for the Studio say that…
entry.content:
Outstanding 10/10

I bought the Echo Studio and Echo Sub from Amazon.

Rational

I have used Echo dots for a long time. When I was looking to replace my computer's speakers I throw the Echo Studio into the possibilities.

Concerns

The specifications for the Studio say that it can be connected to a computer through both bluetooth and a wired connection, but I have found with devices in the past that just because something is capable, it isn't always easy or the results are not what one would expect.

Use

The Amazon Alexa app seems to get worse with time, and you have to use it to set up the speakers. That is the worst part, but I'm used to that by now.

The speakers themselves sound fantastic. If you are not using it to replace a TV sound system, I don't think the subwoofer is necessary. I use them for my TV sound with my Fire TV and love this pairing.

I have connected the Echo Studio to my computer, but mostly just stream music to it from Spotify and use some old computer speakers for the rare time I need to hear computer audio since I mostly rely on headphones. Fortunately, computers can send audio in multiple directions these days.

I was also given a free trial of Amazon Music. What a disappointment. The sound quality is excellent but the day to day use of Amazon Music is too painful. I barely used it at all since you cannot control your audio stream from a desktop computer like you can for Spotify. Until Amazon sorts out that basic feature they will struggle to gain members. Why can every other streaming service work with an Echo and Amazon can't?

Rating

Outstanding. I really love the Echo Studio and Sub and use them for hours every day. 10/10

Buy the Echo Studio and Echo Sub on Amazon

Buy Echo Studio on Amazon

Buy Echo Sub on Amazon

entry.title: Lewis N. Clark RFID-Blocking Hidden Clip Stash Travel Belt Wallet
entry.summary: Outstanding 10/10 I bought off of Amaze for travel but now I use it for my everyday wallet. When traveling, I prefer not to use a regular wallet or anything else a pickpocket might have success in removing from me. This won't replace a wallet…
entry.content:
Outstanding 10/10

I bought off of Amaze for travel but now I use it for my everyday wallet.

 

Rational

When traveling, I prefer not to use a regular wallet or anything else a pickpocket might have success in removing from me.

Use

This won't replace a wallet is you need or want to carry a lot of cards with you. I only keep a driver's license, a credit card, a debit card, and a bit of cash in mine.

When traveling, I do use the clip to keep the wallet secure inside the waistband of my clothes, and my belt conceals and covers it. Unless I am using it, it remains secret.

When at home, I do not use the clip and simply keep the wallet in my front pocket. This breaks the bad habit of a back pocket wallet.

Rating

The Lewis N. Clark Hidden Clip Wallet exceeded my expectations. 10/10

Buy it on Amazon

entry.title: Soundcore by Anker Life Q30 Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones
entry.summary: Great 8/10 I purchased the Anker Soundcore Q30 headphones from Amazon. I can't say that I really needed these, and I haven't used them very much. Mostly I wanted something that could easily be used with my Fire TV for occasions when the house is…
entry.content:
Great 8/10

I purchased the Anker Soundcore Q30 headphones from Amazon.

 

Rational

I can't say that I really needed these, and I haven't used them very much. Mostly I wanted something that could easily be used with my Fire TV for occasions when the house is a bit too noisy or needs to be too quiet.

Concerns

I always have the same concerns about headphones: comfort and sound quality.

Use

Connecting these to other devices through bluetooth is very easy. I have used them with both my Fire TV and my Pixel 7 without any issues.

I do not like the fit very much. The top bar seems to "lean" forward and not sit squarely on the top of my head. For TV watching that is not really an issue. I have worn these vacuuming the house and they shift forward quite a bit and need attention.

As for sound quality I have no complaints. There is an easy "pass through" to quickly turn off the noise cancelling and I really hate it. Instead of being a button, it only requires a touch and it too easy to turn on.

Rating

Great. 8/10

Buy it on Amazon

entry.title: Fire TV Stick 4K Max
entry.summary: Excellent 9/10 I purchased the Fire TV Stick 4K Max from Amazon. I do not connect my TV to the internet. It has mostly been connected to a computer and streaming content has been accessed through a web browser. I first bought the Fire TV…
entry.content:
Excellent 9/10

I purchased the Fire TV Stick 4K Max from Amazon.

 

Rational and Concerns

I do not connect my TV to the internet. It has mostly been connected to a computer and streaming content has been accessed through a web browser.

I first bought the Fire TV Stick to connect to my computer monitor. However I have an extra wide monitor and the Fire TV does not support that resolution and the aspect ratio get mangled. So that was disappointing.

So I connected it to my TV.

Use

The Fire TV connected to a television works really well. I went the extra mile and also paired it with my Echo Studio speakers. What a great combination.

Rating

The Fire TV Stick 4K Max is excellent, but I wish it supported more resolutions and aspect ratios. 9/10

Buy it on Amazon

entry.title: Waterpik Aquarius Water Flosser Professional
entry.summary: Outstanding 10/10 I purchased the Waterpik Aquarius Water Flosser from Amazon. My dental hygienist has be encouraging me to get both an electric toothbrush and a water flosser. I finally made the change and am very happy I did. I was not sure I needed…
entry.content:
Outstanding 10/10

I purchased the Waterpik Aquarius Water Flosser from Amazon.

 

Rational

My dental hygienist has be encouraging me to get both an electric toothbrush and a water flosser. I finally made the change and am very happy I did.

Concerns

I was not sure I needed this. I floss every day.

Use

The Waterpik is very easy to use. I use water that is quite warm.

Since I work from home, I am able to use this after meals whereas I only used to floss once a day. My dental hygiene practices certainly improved with this and my new toothbrush.

Rating

The Waterpik Aquarius exceeded my expectations. 10/10

Buy it on Amazon

entry.title: Philips Sonicare ExpertClean 7500, Rechargeable Electric Power Toothbrush
entry.summary: Outstanding 10/10 I purchased the Sonicare ExpertClean 7500 from Amazon. My dental hygienist has be encouraging me to get both an electric toothbrush and a water flosser. I finally made the change and am very happy I did. I had an electric toothbrush from another…
entry.content:
Outstanding 10/10

I purchased the Sonicare ExpertClean 7500 from Amazon.

 

Rational

My dental hygienist has be encouraging me to get both an electric toothbrush and a water flosser. I finally made the change and am very happy I did.

Concerns

I had an electric toothbrush from another brand (Oral-B) in the past and cannot say I was completely thrilled by it. That experience delayed my purchase of the Sonicare. What a difference between that past toothbrush and this one.

Use

Nothing but praise for this brush. I recommend reading the instructions so that you understand the angles that you should be using to brush your teeth. Other than that, let the brush do the work.

Rating

The Philips Sonicare ExpertClean 7500 exceeded my expectations. 10/10

Buy it on Amazon

entry.title: Greenworks 80V 21" Self-Propelled Mower
entry.summary: Outstanding 10/10 I purchased my mower at Costco, but this is the same mower at Amazon but with different battery options. I purchased an electric mower to replace our old gas mower because I was tired of buying gas, oil, and doing the annual maintenance…
entry.content:
Outstanding 10/10

I purchased my mower at Costco, but this is the same mower at Amazon but with different battery options.

Rational

I purchased an electric mower to replace our old gas mower because I was tired of buying gas, oil, and doing the annual maintenance required of it.

Concerns

I was concerned that an electric mower would have insufficient power for the thick grass on our lawn. This is why I opted for the 80V mower.

Set up

I put the batteries on the charger immediately since they do not come fully charged and should be fully charged before first use (as with most rechargeable battery operated things these days). This did not take more than several minutes for each battery.

There is not much to do to set up the mower other than removing it from the box. I only had to install the top portion of the handle which required the included nuts and bolts and a philips head screwdriver. It was not difficult and the instructions were clear.

Use

Just press the start button and it is running. No gas and no oil and the yearly maintenance of such things.

I mowed our entire yard very quickly using the self-propelled mode almost the entire time. I found the mower to be very powerful and only used the larger 4.0 Ah battery leaving the 2.0 Ah hour battery fully charged. Even when the grass is thicker expect no problems mowing the yard with a single set of charged batteries.

At one point the mower did stop and needed a few seconds before it would restart. I am not sure why this happens (although I read elsewhere that this can occur). It only happened one time over the course of about an hour.

Rating

The Greenworks 80V 21" Self-Propelled Mower exceeded my expectations. 10/10

Buy it on Amazon
